actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction of medical expenses incurred for certain abortions.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny an income tax deduction for medical expenses incurred in connection with abortions, unless the life of the mother would be endangered by carrying the fetus to term.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction of medical expenses incurred for certain abortions.
